H0.text: Friction is the energy that allows the water cycle to occur.

H1.text: Electricity is the energy that allows the water cycle to occur.

H2.text: The Sun is the energy source that allows the water cycle to occur.

H3.text: Radioactive decay is the source of the energy that allows the water cycle to occur.

A4.text: The water cycle is powered by the energy emitted from the sun.
